name: OCKChartControllerProtocol
desc: A protocol that tracks and updates the state of a chart.

items.name: var objectWillChange: CurrentValueSubject<[OCKDataSeries], Never>
items.desc: A publisher that publishes new values when the watched data series changes in the store.

items.name: var store: OCKAnyEventStore
items.desc: A reference to the store that fetches and updates events.
